name: Finn Holland
bio: Cloud Engineer who enjoys spending my spare time researching new technologies - trying my best to implement them, or hiking.
shortBio: I make things go up and down
about: My journey started with Minecraft modding in 2012, the limitless world of creation in software quickly became one of my favourite things and I was hooked on tech ever since. Coming back to now, I have had the pleasure of spending two years at a multi-national firm and a local start-up learning new technologies and improving myself inside the industry while servicing large clients in industries such as employee management, healthcare, and pharmaceuticals. In my spare time I will often be found working on a new project trying to learn and implement something unknown to me onto the cloud. When I'm not spending time developing, I enjoy winding down with a hike or jog, cooking, or informational videos.
